ext.sol":{"keccak256":"0x493033a8d1b176a037b2cc6a04dad01a5c157722049bbecf632ca876224dd4b2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6a708e8a5bdb1011c2c381c9a5cfd8a9a956d7d0a9dc1bd8bcdaf52f76ef2f12","dweb:/ipfs/Qmax9WHBnVsZP46ZxEMNRQpLQnrdE4dK8LehML1Py8FowF"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/cryptography/MerkleProof.sol":{"keccak256":"0x6400c4bee15052e043e5d10315135972529bd1c8012f43da494dc6b4f4661058","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://da5d3d47d35af4373743a559ea4b9b7ecfe4bab6f0703f410c1e59959b7966ac","dweb:/ipfs/QmTHdoghh4WLu4yURjGEgRk162pcwwdsG52MPGa12GqnGR"]},"src/ClaimKAKU.sol":{"keccak256":"0x1bf06690cbde7771635bac5bee2c442bd4fd95b83826c6e56742d5609862eb3d","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://a9a3229ab3c26ce3c26be37511281557d86c6b0ff47750a730945c2a818c20af","dweb:/ipfs/QmU4atEsuwCzTrggBovArDWtnwEAYqeRiqYWE8z5NRpUPW"]}},"version":1}

claimKAKU(uint256,bytes32[]).details: Verifies the caller's address and claim amount against the Merkle root. If the proof is valid, tokens are transferred.

params._amount: The amount of KAKU tokens to claim
params._merkleProof: The Merkle proof verifying the claimant's eligibility

params._merkleRoot: The root hash of the Merkle tree for bonus eligibility
params._token: The address of the KAKU token contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setToken(address).details: Only callable by the contract owner. This allows changing the token contract if needed.

params._token: The new address of the KAKU token contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateMerkleRoot(bytes32).details: Only callable by the contract owner. This allows updating the whitelist without deploying a new contract.

params._merkleRoot: The new root of the Merkle tree

withdrawTokens().details: This function is intended for emergency use to recover tokens from the contract.

claimKAKU(uint256,bytes32[]).notice: Allows eligible addresses to claim their presale KAKU tokens

constructor.notice: Constructor to initialize the contract with the KAKU token address and the Merkle root

setToken(address).notice: Updates the address of the KAKU token contract

updateMerkleRoot(bytes32).notice: Updates the Merkle root to a new value

withdrawTokens().notice: Allows the contract owner to withdraw any tokens remaining in the contract

documentation.text:
@notice Allows the contract owner to withdraw any tokens remaining in the contract
 @dev This function is intended for emergency use to recover tokens from the contract.

@dev This contract allows users to claim KAKU tokens if they are part of a Merkle tree whitelist.
 The contract uses OpenZeppelin's SafeERC20 for safe token transfers and Ownable for access control.
